title: Unlock Your Drop
description: Complete the steps below to securely unlock and access your Drop

additionalInfo.title: Need help? Make sure you have the complete drop key from the sender.
additionalInfo.description: Drop keys expire after viewing or on the scheduled date.

errorMessages.allEmpty: Please enter your drop key to proceed.
errorMessages.general: There was an issue with your drop key. Please check and try again.

verifying.title: Verifying Your Drop Key
verifying.description: Please wait while we securely verify your credentials and decrypt your content...

notfound.title: Drop Not Found
notfound.description: The drop key you entered doesn't exist or has already expired. Please check your key and try again.

error.title: Verification Failed
error.description: Something went wrong during verification. Please check your connection and try again.

rateLimited.title: Too Many Attempts
rateLimited.description: You've made too many verification attempts. Please wait a moment before trying again.

decryptionError.title: Decryption Failed
decryptionError.description: Unable to decrypt the content with the provided key. Please verify your drop key is correct.

accessDrop.title: Verification Successful!
accessDrop.description: Your drop key has been verified and your content is ready to view.
accessDrop.additionalInfo: You'll be redirected to view the decrypted drop content. Remember, some drops can only be viewed once.

info.title: End-to-End Encrypted
info.description: Your content is secured with strong encryption, ensuring only you can access it.

info.title: Zero-Knowledge
info.description: No accounts, no login. Only you have access to your drop key.

info.title: Open Source
info.description: Our code is publicly available for transparency and trust
